pokemons.name: Pikachu
pokemons.description: When it is angered, it discharges the energy stored in its cheeks.

pokemons.name: Mew
pokemons.description: When viewed through a microscope, his delicate hair can be seen.

pokemons.name: Ivysaur
pokemons.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it loses the ability to stand on its hind legs.

pokemons.name: Charmander
pokemons.description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam spouts from the tip of its tail.

pokemons.name: Squirtle
pokemons.description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

pokemons.name: Charizard
pokemons.description: His fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.

pokemons.name: Beedrill
pokemons.description: It has poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

pokemons.name: Sandshrew
pokemons.description: It loves to bathe in sandy areas to rids itself of dirt and moisture clinging to its body.

pokemons.name: Ninetales
pokemons.description: It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.
